view.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
This is the JavaFX controller class for user screen

      FXML Buttons user can interact with

      Create - creates an album when provided a name

      Delete - deletes the selected album

      Open - opens the selected album

      Rename - renames the selected album

      Manage Tags - opens Tag Manager window
